name: Odd-eyes Luminous Dragon
text:
2 Effect Monsters including an "Odd-Eyes" monster
If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy that card, then add 1 "Odd-Eyes" card from your Deck, or face-up Extra Deck to your hand. If a monster(s) is Pendulum Summoned to a zone this card points to: All monsters you currently control gain 500 ATK. If you have no cards in your Pendulum Zones: You can banish this card from your GY; place 2 "Odd-Eyes" cards from your GY or face-up Extra Deck into your Pendulum Zones. You can only use each effect of "Odd-Eyes Luminous Dragon" once per turn.
